02157     }
02158     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_Command42Error == TRUE)
02159     {
02160       /* Forcefully disable the Command Timeout Error Interrupt */
02161       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02162     }
02163 #endif  /*SDMMC_UVP_TEST*/
02164     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02165     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR =  SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_TIMEOUT_ERR_Msk;
02166     /* Release the Semaphore */
02167     Status =osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02168   }
02169   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_2>>> */
02170   /* COMMAND CRC ERROR INTERRUPT */
02171   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_CRC_ERR_Msk ) != 0)
02172   {
02173     /* Update the Global Variable */
02174     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_COMMAND_CRC_ERROR;
02175     /* Change the Command Line Status to free */
02176     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02177     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02178     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_CRC_ERR_Msk;
02179     /* Release the Semaphore */
02180     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02181   }
02182   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_3>>> */
02183   /* COMMAND END BIT ERROR INTERRUPT */
02184   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_END_BIT_ERR_Msk ) != 0)
02185   {
02186     /* Update the Global Variable */
02187     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_COMMAND_ENDBIT_ERROR;
02188     /* Change the Command Line Status to free */
02189     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02190     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02191     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_END_BIT_ERR_Msk;
02192     /* Release the Semaphore */
02193     Status =osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02194   }
02195   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_4>>> */
02196   /* COMMAND INDEX ERROR INTERRUPT */
02197   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_IND_ERR_Msk ) != 0)
02198   {
02199     /* Update the Global Variable */
02200     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_COMMAND_INDEX_ERROR;
02201     /* Change the Command Line Status to free */
02202     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02203 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02204     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError == TRUE)
02205     {
02206       /* Forcefully disable the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02207       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02208     }
02209     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError == TRUE)
02210     {
02211       /* Forcefully disable the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02212       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02213     }
02214 #endif  /*SDMMC_UVP_TEST*/
02215     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02216     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_CMD_IND_ERR_Msk;
02217     /* Release the Semaphore */
02218     Status =osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02219   }
02220   
02221   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_5>>> */
02222   /* DATA TIMEOUT ERROR INTERRUPT */
02223   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_TIMEOUT_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02224   {
02225     /* Update the Global Variable */
02226     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_DATA_TIMEOUT_ERROR;
02227     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02228     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02229     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02230     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_TIMEOUT_ERR_Msk;
02231     /* Release the Semaphore */
02232     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId);
02233   }
02234   
02235   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_6>>> */
02236   /* DATA CRC ERROR INTERRUPT  */
02237   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_CRC_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02238   {
02239     /* Update the Global Variable */
02240     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_DATA_CRC_ERROR;
02241     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02242     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02243 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02244     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_DataErrorInterrupt == TRUE)
02245     {
02246       /* Forcefully trigger the Data Crc Error Interrupt */
02247       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0000 ;
02248       /* Enable the Buffer Ready Status Interrupt */
02249       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_BUFF_READ_READY_EN_Msk;
02250       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_BUFF_READ_READY_EN_Msk;
02251 
02252       /* Enable the Buffer Ready Status Interrupt */
02253       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_BUFF_WRITE_READY_EN_Msk;
02254       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM |= SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_BUFF_WRITE_READY_EN_Msk;
02255     }
02256 #endif
02257     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02258     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_CRC_ERR_Msk;
02259     /* Release the Semaphore */
02260     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId);
02261   }
02262   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_7>>> */
02263   /*DATA END BIT ERROR INTERRUPT */
02264   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_END_BIT_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02265   {
02266     /* Update the Global Variable */
02267     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_DATA_ENDBIT_ERROR;
02268     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02269     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02270     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02271     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_DATA_END_BIT_ERR_Msk;
02272     /* Release the Semaphore */
02273     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId);
02274   }
02275   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_29_8>>> */
02276   /* ACMD12 ERROR INTERUPT */
02277   if ((IntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_ACMD_ERR_Msk) != 0)
02278   {
02279     /* Update the Global Variable */
02280     SDMMC004_Handle.AcmdInterruptError = SDMMC004_ACMD12_ERROR;
02281     /* Change the Cmd line to free  */
02282     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_CMD_ACTIVE;
02283     /* Change the Data line to free  */
02284     SDMMC004_Handle.State &= ~SDMMC004_STATE_DATA_ACTIVE;
02285     /* Clear the Interrupt Status Bit */
02286     SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC_INT_STATUS_ERR_ACMD_ERR_Msk;
02287     /* Release the Semaphore */
02288     Status = osSemaphoreRelease (SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId);
02289   }
02290   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
02291   return Status;
02292 }
02293 
02294 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30>>> */
02295 /*
02296  * This function is use to switch the card state to transferring state if the
02297  * card is not in the transferring state.
02298  */
02299 
02300 status_t SDMMC004_lSwitchToTransferState()
02301 {
02302   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
02303   uint32_t Argument = 0;
02304   uint32_t CardStatus = 0UL;
02305   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
02306   /* Check the current state of the card */
02307   do
02308   { 
02309     Argument |= SDMMC004_CardInfo.Rca << SDMMC004_ARG_RCA_BITPOS;
02310     /* Send Cmd13 to read card status  */
02311     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(13)),Argument, \
02312         SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1,&CardStatus);
02313     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30_1>>> */
02314     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02315     {
02316       break;
02317     }
02318     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30_2>>> */
02319     /* Check if it is in transferring state */
02320     if( (( CardStatus & SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_BITMASK) >>\
02321            SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_BITPOS ) ==  \
02322            SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_TRANS_VALUE )
02323     {
02324 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02325       if ( Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_TransferStateError == TRUE)
02326       {
02327         /* Toggle to the Standy state.*/
02328         Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(7)),Argument, \
02329             SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1b, &CardStatus);
02330         break;
02331       }
02332 #endif
02333       Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
02334       break;
02335     }
02336     /* Switch to transfer state i.e. CMD7 */
02337     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_30_3>>> */
02338     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(7)),Argument, \
02339         SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1b, &CardStatus);
02340   } while(0);
02341   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
02342   return Status;
02343 }
02344 
02345 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_31>>> */
02346 /*
02347  * This function performs the data transfer to/from the card .
02348  */
02349 status_t SDMMC004_lDataTransfer()
02350 {
02351   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
02352   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
02353   do
02354   {
02355 
02356     /* Block on Buffer Read/Write Ready Interrupt */
02357     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_31_1>>> */
02358     SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex =osSemaphoreWait ( SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId,\
02359                                                 SDMMC004_RESET_In_DATA_TRANSFER);
02360     if( SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02361     { 
02362       break;
02363     }
02364     /* Check Buffer is ready */
02365     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_31_2>>> */
02366     if (SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError != SDMMC004_BUFFER_READY)
02367     {
02368       SDMMC004_Handle.IssueAbort = 1;
02369       Status = SDMMC004_lErrorInterruptRecovery( \
02370                                     SDMMC004_ISRContext.InterruptStatusShadow,\
02371                                     SDMMC004_Handle.IssueAbort);
02372                                     }
02373   } while(0);
02374   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
02375   return Status;
02376 }
02377 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_43>>> */
02378 /*
02379  * This function checks the PCMD flag.
02380  */
02381 void SDMMC004_CheckPCMDFlag(status_t PCMDFlag)
02382 {
02383   SDMMC004_ReturnStatus  = 1UL;
02384   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_43_1>>> */
02385   if (PCMDFlag == 1)
02386   {
02387     ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_BOTH_ERROR,0,0);
02388   }
02389   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_43_2>>> */
02390   else
02391   {
02392     ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_SD_TRANSFER_ERROR,0,0);
02393   }
02394 }
02395 
02396 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32>>> */
02397 /*
02398  * This function performs the ACMD error Recovery.
02399  */
02400 void SDMMC004_lAcmdErrorRecovery()
02401 {
02402   status_t Status;
02403   status_t PCMDFlag = 0;
02404   uint32_t CardStatus = 0;
02405   do
02406   {
02407     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_1>>> */
02409     if ( ((SDMMC->ACMD_ERR_STATUS & SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_ACMD12_NOT_EXEC_ERR_Msk) >> \
02410            SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_ACMD12_NOT_EXEC_ERR_Pos)  == 1 )
02411     {
02412       /* Set PCMDFlag to 1*/
02413       PCMDFlag = 1;
02414       /* Check Return Status of Recovery function of CMD_wo_DAT command */
02415       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_2>>> */
02416       if (SDMMC004_Handle.ErrorRecoveryStatus != SDMMC004_RECOVERABLE_ERROR)
02417       {
02418         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_NONRECOVERABLE_ERROR,0,0);
02419         break;
02420       }
02421       /* For recoverable error, issue CMD12 */
02422       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(12)), \
02423                                       SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1,
02424                                       &CardStatus);
02425       /* No Error */
02426       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_3>>> */
02427       if (Status == (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02428       {
02429         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_CMD_wo_DAT_ERROR,0,0);
02430         break;
02431       }
02432       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_4>>> */
02433       /* Non Recoverable Error */
02434       if (Status == (uint32_t)SDMMC004_NONRECOVERABLE_ERROR)
02435       {
02436         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02437         break;
02438       }
02439     }
02440     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_5>>> */
02441     else
02442     {
02443       /* Set software reset for CMD line */
02444       Status = SDMMC004_lReset(SDMMC_SW_RESET_SW_RST_CMD_LINE_Msk);
02445       if ( Status !=(uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02446       {
02447         break;
02448       }
02449       /* Issue Cmd 12*/
02450       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_6>>> */
02451       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand(  &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(12)), \
02452                                        SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, \
02453                                        &CardStatus);
02454       /* Non Recoverable Error */
02455       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_7>>> */
02456       if (Status == (uint32_t)SDMMC004_NONRECOVERABLE_ERROR)
02457       {
02458         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02459         break;
02460       }
02461     }
02462     /*Set Software Reset for  Data line*/
02463     Status = SDMMC004_lReset(SDMMC_SW_RESET_SW_RST_DAT_LINE_Msk);
02464     if ( Status !=(uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02465     {
02466       break;
02467     }
02468     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_8>>> */
02469     /*Check Command Not issued by Auto CMD12 Error */
02470     if ( ((SDMMC->ACMD_ERR_STATUS & \
02471            SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_CMD_NOT_ISSUED_BY_ACMD12_ERR_Msk) >> \
02472            SDMMC_ACMD_ERR_STATUS_CMD_NOT_ISSUED_BY_ACMD12_ERR_Pos) == 1)
02473     {
02474       ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, SDMMC004_ACMD_CMD_wo_DAT_NOT_ISSUED,0,0);
02475     }
02476     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_32_9>>> */
02477     else
02478     {
02479       /* Check PCMD flag.If 1 means that An error occurred in CMD_wo_DAT,
02480        *  and also occurred in the SD memory transfer */
02481       SDMMC004_CheckPCMDFlag(PCMDFlag);
02482     }
02483   } while(0);
02484 }
02485 
02486 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_33 >>> */
02490 void SDMMC004_lDelay(uint32_t DelayTime)
02491 {
02492   osDelay(DelayTime);
02493 }
02494 
02495 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_34 >>>
02496  *  SDMMC Interrupt Handler */
02497 void SDMMC0_0_IRQHandler()
02498 {
02499   uint32_t Status;
02500   NormalIntStatus = SDMMC->INT_STATUS_NORM;
02501   ErrorIntStatus  = SDMMC->INT_STATUS_ERR;
02502   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_34_1 >>> */
02503   if (NormalIntStatus & SDMMC_INT_STATUS_NORM_ERR_INT_Msk)
02504   {
02505     Status = SDMMC004_lErrorInterruptHandler( ErrorIntStatus );
02506     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02507     {
02508       ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02509     }
02510   }
02511   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_34_2 >>> */
02512   if(NormalIntStatus & SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_STATUS_BITS)
02513   {
02514     Status = SDMMC004_lNormalInterruptHandler( NormalIntStatus);
02515     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02516     {
02517       ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status,0,0);
02518     }
02519   }
02520 }
02521 
02522 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_35 >>> */
02523 status_t SDMMC004_lCreateOSResources()
02524 {
02525   status_t Status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
02526   do
02527   {
02528     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_35_1 >>> */
02529     if(SDMMC004_Handle.OSResourcesCreated == 0)
02530     {
02531       /* Create Data & Command Mutex */
02532       SDMMC004_CmdMutexId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(CmdMutexHandle));
02533       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_CmdMutexId ))
02534       {
02535         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02536         break;
02537       }
02538       SDMMC004_DataMutexId = osMutexCreate(osMutex(DataMutexHandle));
02539       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_DataMutexId ))
02540       { 
02541         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02542         break;
02543       }
02544       /* Create Data & Command Semaphore */
02545       SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId = osSemaphoreCreate (osSemaphore(CmdSemaphore), 1); 
02546       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId))
02547       { 
02548         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02549         break;
02550       }
02551       SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId = osSemaphoreCreate (osSemaphore(DataSemaphore), 1);
02552       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId))
02553       { 
02554         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02555         break;
02556       } 
02557       SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreId= osSemaphoreCreate (osSemaphore(TransferSemaphore), 1);
02558       if ((NULL ==  SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreId))
02559       {
02560         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02561         break;
02562       }
02563       /* Take the semaphores  */
02564       SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreIndex = osSemaphoreWait(SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreId,\
02565                                     SDMMC004_SEMAPHORE_BLK_TIME);
02566       if( SDMMC004_CmdSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02567       {
02568         Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL; 
02569         break;
02570       } 
02571       SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex =osSemaphoreWait (SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreId,\
02572                                                  SDMMC004_SEMAPHORE_BLK_TIME);
02573       if( SDMMC004_DataSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02574       {
02575         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02576         break;
02577       }
02578       SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreIndex =osSemaphoreWait (\
02579                                                 SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreId,\
02580                                                 osWaitForever );
02581       if( SDMMC004_TransferSemaphoreIndex < 0)
02582       {
02583         Status = (uint32_t) SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
02584         break;
02585       }
02586       SDMMC004_Handle.OSResourcesCreated = 1;
02587     }
02588   } while(0);
02589   return Status;
02590 }
02591 
02592 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36 >>> */
02593 /*
02594  * This function performs the card initialization and identification operation.
02595  */
02596 status_t SDMMC004_lCardIdentificationProcess()
02597 {
02598   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
02599   /* Silicon Testing Added */
02600   do
02601   {
02602     /* Confirm the Internal clock gets Stable before setting the SD clock. */
02603     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_1 >>> */
02604     if ( !(SDMMC->CLOCK_CTRL & SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_INTERNAL_CLOCK_STABLE_Msk))
02605     {
02606       break;
02607     }
02608     /* Enable the SD clock */
02609     SDMMC->CLOCK_CTRL |= SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_SDCLOCK_EN_Msk;
02610     /* Set Power Control Register */
02611     SET_BIT( SDMMC->POWER_CTRL, SDMMC_POWER_CTRL_SD_BUS_POWER_Pos);
02612     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_2 >>> */
02613     if(SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag == 0)
02614     {
02615       Status  = SDMMC004_lInitializeCard();
02616       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_3 >>> */
02617       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS )
02618       {
02619         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status, 0, NULL);
02620         break;
02621       }/* End of " if( Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS )"*/
02622       Status = SDMMC004_lAfterCardInitialize();
02623       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_36_4 >>> */
02624       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS )
02625       {
02626         ERROR(GID_SDMMC00x, Status, 0, NULL);
02627         break;
02628       }/* End of "if(Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS )" */
02629     }/* End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_INITIALIZED)
02630                    == 0 )"*/
02631   } while(0);
02632   return Status;
02633 }
02634 
02635 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_39 >>> */
02639 status_t SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(uint32_t SectorNumberParam, \
02640                                     uint32_t SectorCountParam)
02641 {
02642   status_t Status;
02643   uint32_t SectorCount = 0;
02644   do
02645   {
02646     /* Get Sector Count function   */
02647     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_39_1 >>> */
02648     Status = SDMMC004_GetSectorCount((void *)&SectorCount);
02649     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02650     {
02651       break;
02652     }
02653     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_39_2 >>> */
02654     /* Check the Sector Count limit */
02655     if((SectorNumberParam + SectorCountParam) >= SectorCount)
02656     {
02657       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_SECTOR_OUT_OF_BOUND;
02658     }
02659   } while(0);
02660   return Status;
02661 }
02662 
02663 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40 >>> */
02664 /*
02665  * The function performs the actual erase operation.
02666  */
02667 status_t SDMMC004_lLocalErase
02668 (
02669   uint32_t StartAddr,
02670   uint32_t EndAddr,
02671   uint32_t TimeoutVal
02672 )
02673 {
02674   /* Stores the response received  */
02675   uint32_t CardStatus = 0;
02676   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
02677   do
02678   {
02679     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_1>>> */
02680     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)
02681     {
02682       StartAddr *= 512UL;
02683       EndAddr *=  512UL;
02684     }/*End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)" */
02685     /* MMC Card */
02686 #if SDMMC_SUPPORT_MMC_CARD
02687     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_2>>> */
02688     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_MMC) != 0 )
02689     {
02690       /* Erase Start Command */
02691 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02692       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError == TRUE)
02693       {
02694         /* Forcefully trigger the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02695         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02696         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02697         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02698         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02699       }
02700 #endif
02701       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_MMC_COMMAND(35)),\
02702                                       StartAddr, RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus );
02703       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_3>>> */
02704       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02705       {
02706         break;
02707       }
02708       /* Erase End Command */
02709 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02710       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError == TRUE)
02711       {
02712         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02713         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02714         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02715         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02716       }
02717 #endif
02718       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_MMC_COMMAND(36)),EndAddr, \
02719           RESPONSE_R1,&CardStatus );
02720       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_4>>> */
02721       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02722       {
02723         break;
02724       }
02725     }
02726     /* SD Card */
02727     else
02728 #endif /* SDMMC_SUPPORT_MMC_CARD */
02729     {
02730 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02731       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError == TRUE)
02732       {
02733         /* Forcefully trigger the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02734         //  SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0004 ;
02735         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02736         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02737         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02738         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02739       }
02740 #endif
02741       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_5>>> */
02742       /* SD Erase Start Command */
02743       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(32)), \
02744           StartAddr, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus);
02745       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02746       {
02747         break;
02748       } /* if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS) */
02749       /* SD Erase End Command */
02750 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02751       if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError == TRUE)
02752       {
02753         /* Forcefully trigger the Command Index Error Interrupt */
02754         //   SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0004 ;
02755         /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
02756         SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02757         /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
02758         SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
02759       }
02760 #endif
02761       Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(33)),EndAddr, \
02762           SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus);
02763       /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_6>>> */
02764       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02765       {
02766         break;
02767       }/* End of " if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)"*/
02768     }/* End of "if SD card"*/
02769 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
02770     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_DataErrorInterrupt == TRUE)
02771     {
02772       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Status Interrupt */
02773       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02774       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Signal Interrupt */
02775       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk  );
02776     }
02777 
02778     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_TransferInterruptError == TRUE)
02779     {
02780       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Status Interrupt */
02781       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
02782       /* Disable the Transfer Complete Signal Interrupt */
02783       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~(SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_TX_COMPLETE_EN_Msk  );
02784     }
02785 #endif
02786     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(38)),\
02787                                     SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1b,\
02788                                     &CardStatus);
02789     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_nonAPI_40_7>>> */
02790     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
02791     {
02792       break;
02793     }/* End of " if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)"*/
02794     SDMMC004_lDelay(TimeoutVal * 1000);
02795   } while(0);
02796   return Status;
02797 }
